```{r knitrOptions, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
options(digits = 4, width = 80)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  include = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  dev = c('png'),
  fig.width = 6, fig.height = 3.5,
  dpi = 300, 
  fig.pos = 'H')
```

### 加载包
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

### 查看数据集
```{r}
iris %>% tibble::as_tibble()
```

### 绘制散点图
```{r}
p <- ggplot(iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_classic()
p
```
